ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

oppression.question: Have I mistreated, harassed, or discriminated against others through my deeds?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: by my words , actions , or decisions
oppression.question: Have I unjustly oppressed others by my words, actions, or decisions?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: such as achieving success in your career or excelling in outdoor activities , to your own abilities rather than acknowledging God 's providence
autonomy.question: Did you attribute your accomplishments in life, such as achieving success in your career or excelling in outdoor activities, to your own abilities rather than acknowledging God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: to others , including friends and acquaintances
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others, including friends and acquaintances, with vulgar or inappropriate language?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable through my deeds
beyond what 's reasonable through my deeds
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable through my deeds, leading me to neglect self-control?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Have you overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, demonstrating an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures?

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: especially during social gatherings or conversations with close friends
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true, especially during social gatherings or conversations with close friends?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing faults or private affairs about friends or acquaintances

gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: rather than seeking forgiveness from those I have hurt
anger.question: Have I nursed anger or held onto feelings of rage rather than seeking forgiveness from those I have hurt?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.

extracted_data_phrases: towards my partner , friends , or colleagues
anger.question: Have I nursed anger towards my partner, friends, or colleagues rather than seeking reconciliation through open communication?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.

impurity.question: Did you use certain practices to prevent pregnancy in your relationship?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.

extracted_data_phrases: by using practices , substances , or objects to prevent pregnancy
impurity.question: Did I intentionally separate the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage by using practices, substances, or objects to prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.
